page.title: 10RADIO ERSKINE
page.content: Radio Erskine broadcasts to an audience of approximately 80 people. The audience are the residents of Westlands Hostel in Erskine and Scotscraig Hostel in Paisley. Both are hostels for the physically and mentally handicapped. They have been broadcasting from the small studio in Westlands Hostel for two and a half years. There are eight presenters in Radio Erskine. They feature a variety of music on their programmes from classical to pop. They also have competitions and story serials for their listeners to enjoy. They broadcast on Thursdays, Saturdays and Sundays. It is a charity organisation.
